articles.author: Nick Ames
articles.title: Ødegaard edges Arsenal to win at Crystal Palace despite Tomiyasu red - The Guardian
articles.description: Martin Ødegaard’s second-half penalty earned Arsenal a 1-0 victory at Crystal Palace despite Takehiro Tomiyasu being sent off after a second booking
articles.content: There was, as the saying goes, little for the end-of-season highlights reel here. Arsenal will not mind, given they navigated their way through an almighty scrap, and the celebrations of their coachi… [+9505 chars]
